R

randomAttackType() - Static method in class general.Chances
Returns a random monster attack.
randomFloat(float, float) - Static method in class general.Chances
Return a random float between two float barriers.
randomFreeField(Element[][]) - Static method in class general.Chances
Finds a random free field in a room.
randomItem(Map<Enums.ItemClasses, Float>, Map<Enums.ItemClasses, HashMap<Item, Integer>>, Map<String, Integer>) - Static method in class general.Chances
Takes a Map of ItemClass - Float pairs describing the probability for each type of Item.
randomMonster(Map<Enums.Levels, Float>, Map<Enums.Levels, HashMap<String, Integer>>, Map<String, Integer>) - Static method in class general.Chances
Takes a Map of MonsterLevel - Float pairs describing the probability for each type of Monster.
randomRoom() - Static method in class general.Chances
Returns Point for a random Room on the map, excluding the treasure Chamber.
randomTile(Room) - Static method in class general.Chances
Returns a random empty tile in a room.
removeActivePotions(Potion) - Method in class elements.Creature
Removes a potion from the list of active potions.
removeContentInFrontOfPlayer() - Method in class gameEssentials.Map
When a monster looses a fight, it has to be removed from the map.
render(GameContainer, Graphics) - Method in class gameEssentials.Game

Resets game after a round has finished.
reset() - Static method in class gameEssentials.Map
Resets map after a round has finished.

Resets AttackFactory after a round has finished.
reset() - Static method in class general.ResourceManager
Resets Resource Manager after a round has finished.

Resets map after a round has finished.
resetLobbyHost() - Method in class at.RDG.network.NetworkManager
 
resetOriginals() - Method in class elements.Creature
Resets Creature's stats to its original (before Fight) values.
resetPlayerPosition() - Method in class gameEssentials.Player
Resets position of a player which has lost a fight.
ResourceManager - Class in general
ResourceManager loads all Data from Config Files and Resources from harddrive into memory.
ResourceManager() - Constructor for class general.ResourceManager
Constructs a RessourceManager.
Room - Class in elements
There are 6 types of rooms:
Dead End, Hallway, Turn, T-Junction, Junction, Treasure Chamber.
Room(Enums.RoomTypes, Element[][], Element[][]) - Constructor for class elements.Room
Constructs a room and positions monsters and items inside this room at random positions (only 1 per tile).
ROOM_TEMPLATES - Variable in class general.ResourceManager
 
RoomFactory - Class in general
RoomFactory receives a Room's default parameters form RoomTemplate class.

ROOMSHOR - Static variable in class gameEssentials.Game

ROOMSVER - Static variable in class gameEssentials.Game
 
RoomTemplate - Class in configLoader
RoomTemplate is used to store the default Room values.

Construct a RoomTemplate storing the default Room values.
ROOMWIDTH - Static variable in class gameEssentials.Game
 
round(float, int) - Static method in class general.Common
Used for rounding.
run() - Method in class at.RDG.network.communication.NetworkReader
The method is started if the thread is started and reads everything from the network stream and writes it into the queue.
run() - Method in class at.RDG.network.communication.NetworkWriter
The method is started if the thread is started and writes every time it is notified everything in the queue into the network stream.
run() - Method in class at.RDG.network.discovery.LobbySearcher
The method is started if the thread is started and searches for Lobbies in the local network.
run() - Method in class at.RDG.network.discovery.LobbyServer
The method is started if the thread is started and responses to every discovery request it receives.
run(String) - Static method in class configLoader.ArmamentsLoader
Tries to parse XML Config File.

run() - Method in class configLoader.Configloader
